solution_line_template: First find the total rise time: {rise_time_per_instance} minutes * {num_rise_instances} = <<{rise_time_per_instance}*{num_rise_instances}={total_rise_time}>>{total_rise_time} minutes

Then add the rise time to the baking and kneading time: {total_rise_time} minutes + {kneading_time} minutes + {baking_time} minutes = <<{total_rise_time}+{kneading_time}+{baking_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
